mapper.select: Select a.app_id, a.app_name, b.subject, b.user_id, b.doc_no, b.create_date, b.bd_count, b.good_count From bd_qna b, app_info a Where a.app_id = b.app_id And user_id = #{user_id}

Select (select count(*) from bd_qna where user_id = #{user_id}) + (select count(*) from bd_free where user_id = #{user_id}) + (select count(*) from prj_bd_rep where user_id = #{user_id}) + (select count(*) from prj_bd_data where user_id = #{user_id}) From DUAL

Select s.user_id, a.app_name, m.doc_no, m.app_id, m.subject, m.create_date, m.bd_count, m.good_count From bd_qna m, bd_qna_good s, app_info a Where m.doc_no = s.doc_no And m.app_id = a.app_id And s.user_id = #{user_id}
